_header: In a bolts-head all three wipe ye
Subjects: alchemy; illustrations, verse accompanying; utilitarian verse
_description: Instructions for the use of alchemical equipment — six couplets and an unrhymed line on an illustration

CamTCC1312.First Lines:
In a boltes hede all thre wype ȝeIn balneo to þe mydys 20
                    wekes& threto þu se your medesyn whyght or redeþen
                    þu haste þy mater all redy I-spede…
CamTCC1312.Last Lines:
…þat ys I cleped homothenyes be þe same Namefynde yt
                    yff ȝe canne I wyll noȝt you blamebe ware of fals writtyng I rede
                    the
CamTCC1312.Attributed Title: Aphebe Aphebe lumen de aqua vyte (f. 7)
